title.en: A collection of photographs of Merched y Wawr Eigiau, Aberconwy
title.cy: Casgliad o luniau o gangen Merched y Wawr Eigiau, Rhanbarth Aberconwy

description.en: Casgliad o luniau o’r gangen yn dathlu ei phenblwydd yn 25 yn ‘Y Lodge’, Talybont yn 1996. Joan Jones, Ifora Owen, Beatrice Jones, Mair B Williams, Gwen Humphries, Bet Hughes, Rhiannon Hughes, Margaret Edwards, Olwen Williams, Euron Owen, Mair A Williams, Dori Jones, Nora L Jones, Beryl Griffith, Margaret Fru, Eirlys Carpenter, Dilys Phillips, Eirlys Roberts, Megan Clark, Mair Davies, Gwyneth Roberts, Myfanwy Williams, Ann Jones, Myra Jones, Eirlys Williams, Elen Griffiths.
